Class MUDServerImpl

java.lang.Object
  MUDServerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MUDServer, java.rmi.Remote
public class MUDServerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements MUDServer

This is the server implementation. This class implements all public methods from the remote server interface.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Krzysztof Kondrak
